meanings.definition: Freegans: People who reject consumerism and seek to reduce waste by salvaging discarded items for free.
meanings.sent1: The freegans in our community organize swap meets to share their salvaged treasures.
meanings.sent2: I heard the freegans found a perfectly good couch by the dumpster.
meanings.sent3: The freegans joked that their living room looked like a museum of discarded goods.
meanings.sent4: The freegans' ability to turn trash into treasure is truly remarkable.
meanings.sent5: The freegans' dedication to reducing waste is an inspiration to us all.

meanings.definition: Freegans: The practice of obtaining food and other goods through dumpster diving and other means of scavenging.
meanings.sent1: Last weekend, the freegans scored a huge haul of fresh produce from the local market's dumpster.
meanings.sent2: The freegans shared tips on safe dumpster diving techniques with their friends.
meanings.sent3: The freegans laughed as they proudly displayed their dumpster-dived gourmet meal.
meanings.sent4: The freegans' dumpster diving skills are unmatched in our neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The freegans' resourcefulness in finding food is truly impressive.
